rules_text:
When Felice the Binder is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of the next end step, destroy all creatures, then exile all graveyards.
Return up to one target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
You get an emblem with “Creatures you control have indestructible.”
special_text:
When Felice the Binder is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of the next end step, destroy all creatures, then exile all graveyards.
[+2]: Return up to one target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control have indestructible.”
